# <a name="create-an-email-signature-in-outlook-on-the-web"></a><span data-ttu-id="47385-102">在 web 上的 Outlook 中创建电子邮件签名</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="47385-102">Create an email signature in Outlook on the web</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="47385-103">转到</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="47385-103">Go to</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="47385-104">**设置**  > **查看所有 Outlook 设置**  > **撰写和回复**。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="47385-104">**Settings** > **View all Outlook settings** > **Compose and reply**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="47385-105">在 " **电子邮件签名**" 下，键入您的签名并使用可用的格式选项来更改其外观。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="47385-105">Under **Email signature**, type your signature and use the available formatting options to change its appearance.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="47385-106">*注意：* 每个帐户只能有一个签名。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="47385-106">*Note:* You can have only one signature per account.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="47385-107">若要了解详细信息，请参阅在 [web 上的 Outlook 中创建和添加电子邮件签名](https://support.office.com/article/5ff9dcfd-d3f1-447b-b2e9-39f91b074ea3)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="47385-107">To learn more, see [Create and add an email signature in Outlook on the web](https://support.office.com/article/5ff9dcfd-d3f1-447b-b2e9-39f91b074ea3).</span></span>
